I would like to suggest to visit Dr. Radhika if you have any fertility problems.

She while talking to her patients do take care of emotional and social aspects of the background patient‚Äôs coming from . 
Overall a extraordinary Dr with very human approach for women‚Äôs gynaecological or pregnancy related issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Radhika is an excellent, compassionate, friendly person. She always listens to you patiently & does not rush through the visits. Even the staff here is very attentive & helpful. We are lucky to have been associated with ma‚Äôam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
We are not happy parents because of Dr.Radhika ,  I cannot express enough how impressed I am with her care and professionalism. From the moment I walked into her office, I felt welcomed and at ease. The staff was friendly and efficient.

Doc takes enough time to listen to my concerns and life styles and then suggested suitable medications and procedures. Her expertise and compassionate approach made me feel confident and reassured throughout my visit.

Her warm demeanor and genuine concern for her patients are truly commendable.

I highly recommend Dr. Radhika to anyone seeking a knowledgeable and caring gynaecologist. She is a true professional who goes above and beyond for her patients, and I am grateful to have found such an excellent healthcare provider.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I was married in 2018. Soon after my marriage, I was diagnosed with tuberculosis, It was a 7 months treatment. Amidst the treatment, I conceived. I didn‚Äôt knew how to react. It was a mixed feeling as somewhere in my heart I knew that I cannot carry the baby for long. I was 5 weeks 6 days pregnant And, we were advised by the doctor to abort the baby, we took opinion of pulmonologist too but he advised us the same. So with a heavy heart we had to go for MTP. Post MTP, I suffered from various health issues (thyroid, anemia‚Ä¶) I worked on my health. Got all the tests done again and then tried to conceive. We tried for 2-3 years, but didn‚Äôt get any positive result. 
Then we decided to consult a infertility specialist and hence we reached out to Dr. Radhika. After our first meeting with the doctor, we had immense trust in her as she was approachable, honest and forthright. She explained us everything well in the initial appointments that later we didn‚Äôt had any questions to ask but just the faith in her expertise. She advised her to go for IVF ICSI and counselled us briefly about the same. It was a costly affair but all worth it. We started our IVF journey in the month of February, 2023  and now (May,2023), we are over the moon to announce our first pregnancy. Trust in doctor leads to wonders. 
Cannot thank Dr. Radhika enough to have have walked with us in this journey and supporting us all the time. 
May God bless her! 

We are grateful and blessed üòá 
Seeking love and blessings for the days to come in our parenthood journey üôè
-Harshu and Sudhanshu

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Fertilisation In Vitro - Embryo Transfer (IVF - ET),
review:
Firstly, my humble request to all the couples who aspire to be parents. IVF is not an easy journey. But you have waited so long for this happiness, have a little more patience. Not everyone gets success in 1st attempt. It varies for every couple. So be patient and stay positive. That‚Äôs what worked for me.
We have been trying to conceive for 8 years. I have been struggling with PCOD due to which I had unbalanced hormone issues. I did stimulated ovulation cycles, ovarian drilling but no result. Then shifted to Hyderabad and looked for an IVF specialist nearby online. That‚Äôs how I met my doc Dr. Radhika Reddy Pingli. She was very polite, positive, calm and reassuring that we will go down this path together to help me conceive. We straightaway asked for IVF as we had waited for a long time.
We conceived the first time (1st FET) itself, but unfortunately I had early miscarriage naturally. My beta HCG levels dropped. That‚Äôs when it hit me badly as if I can never be a mother. But I kept my patience and I had to face the failure for next 2 FETs as well. 3 failed FETs and I was heartbroken but I did not lose my hope and my trust on Dr. Radhika. As she said, she really walked down this path with us. She understood my emotional situation, always offered positive advice and was always available on phone outside the hospital hours. She adapted to changes in my treatment to provide the best for me. She is very friendly and a good listener. We are blessed and I am 7 months pregnant right now. Though my conceiving journey was also a bit tensed but she helped me get through the first 5 months smoothly and I could see the happiness on her face too, which showed her concern for me. She helped us to choose a gynaecologist to continue with.
Thanks to Dr. Radhika, it‚Äôs my dream come true to be a mother. Though it took us more than a year due to this pandemic situation and 3 FET failures but all's well that ends well. We highly recommend her to anyone aspiring to be parents but facing difficulties. We will definitely meet her with our baby once the situations are normal cause she is the one who gave us this happiness and I can never thank her enough.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I visited Dr. Radhika's Fertinova clinic, and I couldn't be more impressed with the level of care and professionalism I experienced. From the moment I walked in, the staff was welcoming and efficient, creating a comfortable atmosphere.

Dr. Radhika Reddy Pingili is an exceptional gynecologist who combines expertise with genuine compassion. She took the time to thoroughly explain each step, ensuring I felt informed and at ease throughout the process. Her approachable demeanor and willingness to address all my concerns made the visit not only informative but also reassuring.

The clinic itself is clean, well-maintained, and equipped with the latest technology, reflecting a commitment to providing the best possible care. The support staff was courteous, efficient, and respectful of privacy.

What sets Dr. Radhika apart is her emphasis on patient education. She patiently answered all my questions, providing valuable insights into my health and well-being. It's evident that she genuinely cares about her patients and their overall wellness.

I highly recommend Fertinova & Dr. Radhika to anyone seeking a knowledgeable and compassionate gynecologist. The entire experience, from scheduling appointments to the actual visit, was seamless and positive. Thank you to the entire team for their dedication to patient care.
reply_text:
Thank you divya
Hope your pregnancy goes seamless as wellüòä

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
If you have fertility problems, you must visit Dr Radhika Reddy Pingili. She is really friendly, motivating,  understands your situation, gives geniune advise, explains everything clearly and the most important thing is she is managing the patients single handedly, means you dont need to rush for scans and injections to diff doctors within same clinic, she herself does it. The waiting time at her clinic is managed well compared to other fertility clinics, you dont need to wait for hours and hours for your turn.

I have visited almost every topmost fertility centers in Hyd but no luck.

In March 2021, I have visited Radhika Ma'am and asked straight for IVF,  after knowing my medical history, she agreed.  I had a history of 4 failed IUI's in last 4 years and 1 Missed Miscarriage with IVF in 2019. Apart from this I was diagnosed with TB and had low AMH. My husband's sperm count was also on lower side. I also suffered from covid during May and June 2021.

 In Aug'21 I got successful result with IVF frozen transfer and currently I am 7 months pregnant. 

I am really grateful to Radhika Ma'am. Thank you so much for everything!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
We are so grateful to Dr.Radhika Reddy. *** ** *** ** *** **** ******* **** ** ********* *** she is always available for your all fertility problems. She first listens to our problems and has a great potential and experience in diagnosis and treatments. It was the wisest decision by us to consult Dr.Radhika for our problem. It is the 4th Year of our married life and after one miscarriage,  one of our family friend advised us to visit Dr.Radhika for treatment.

We took our first appointment in Sep-2021, and by the time I'm sharing my story in Jan-2022 my wife is 3rd month pregnant. Before consulting Dr.Radhika, we visited 2,3 hospitals but none of them were able to spot the problem. She carried out few tests and procedures, and explained us the problem and that was not so serious. She assured us that within 6 months of affordable treatment, all the minor issues will be gone. But it didn't even take that long, just within 3 months of treatment my wife has become pregnant. 

I strongly recommend every couple out there with fertility problems, to consult Dr.Radhika. She has lot of patience to listen to us before starting any treatment. She clearly explains the problem and the procedures before she starts the problems. Not only the Doctor, but also Innovate Fertility Clinic staff are so polite and helpful. Once again, thanks a million Dr.Radhika ma'm.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We visited Radhika mam for infertility treatment after reviewing a lot of doctors. Right from the first visit, she heard out our concerns completely (unlike other doctors who simply asked us to get tests without even talking to us) and only then suggested a treatment plan accordingly. Every step of the way, she explained the reasons for the next stage of treatment and counselled us to take the right decision without forcing us to take any specific step.  We faced multiple challenges during our journey to conceive (multiple IUIs, IVF), but her vast experience with these situations and her friendly & caring attitude made it easy for us to completely trust her on the treatment plan. Her decisions were never rushed and she waited for the right time for my body to be supportive of next treatment steps. She is also extremely approachable and responded to all our questions throughout patiently.  Thanks to her efforts, our prayers are now answered and we are looking forward to our baby's arrival soon! Highly recommend anyone facing infertility issues to visit Radhika mam!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We were struggling with Unexplained Infertility concerns for quite some time and after doing couple of rounds with different Fertility Hospitals in Hyderabad, we met Dr. Radhika and the way she assessed our case & explained the treatment process, which gave us the confidence and ray of hope to us.

Following through treatment process under her supervision, we realized she takes her cases with full ownership, dedication, one step at a time and always ready to answer the questions we may have. Least to mention she is one of the Top Fertility Experts with wealth of experience, we have in Hyderabad city, she knows her subject in-and-out with multiple success stories.

Always sorted, very friendly with cool and calm attitude, shows the right path with guidelines, provide options and most importantly a very good human being apart from being an expert in her field.

We have been successful following her treatment and expecting our bundle of joys soon :-), please do visit her @Innovate Fertility Clinic, Kondapur if you have any infertility concerns and you will be taken care very well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: We went to her for fertility treatment and when we first met her, we were scared out of our wits because of our previous discussion with another doctor but she assured us that there is nothing to panic and it was that assurance and positivity that she shared which helped me conceive. Even after conceiving,I was too anxious which would've surely irritated someone, what with the incessant questions but she has been so patient throughoutand that helped me get through the first trimester and after that when I had to choose a gynaecologist to continue with, she actually helped me find one which was not very easy because I don't get comfortable very soon but somehow she understood this and she helped me find someone who I was comfortable with which honestly she didn't have to do. She couldve just referred me to anyone but she knew how special this is for us and more than anything I think that's the reason I would recommend her. Because she knows how important this is for us. In short you will feel that positivity instantly and trust me that's what you need more than treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Fertilisation In Vitro - Embryo Transfer (IVF - ET),
review:
My fertility treatment was such a long and arduous journey filled with so many emotions. After many years of not being able to conceive, I was terrified to start my journey with a fertility doctor. Now I can happily say that getting consulted under Dr Radhika Reddy Pingili was my best decision ever. The greatest quality is that she puts patients at ease. She is quick and decisive and does not recommend un wanted tests even after prompting. It‚Äôs very evident that she has a full understanding of what her patients may be going through emotionally, physically, and spiritually. I had so many questions and was so confused at the beginning, but she knew exactly how much to answer me and also quickly deviate my thoughts from wandering into unwanted queries, which is very important for any IVF patient. My success was actually important to her. An amazing feeling from a doctor these days. 
We had a game plan and I am proud to say I am 6 weeks pregnant. It wouldn‚Äôt have been possible without Dr. Radhika and me and my husband just can‚Äôt thank her and her team enough. 
I know how tough a decision it is to choose the right fertility doctor and I would heart-fully recommend her to anyone who is having fertility issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Infertility Evaluation / Treatment,PCOD/PCOS Treatment,Pregnancy Tests,Fertilisation In Vitro - Embryo Transfer (IVF - ET),Treatment of polycystic ovarian syndrome(PCOS),
review: We have consulted DR. Radhika Reddy Mam in the month of Dec 2021 as we are planning to become parents from 2019. During our first consultation Mam listened to our concerns and suggested to do a scan for which I am very scared and didn‚Äôt cooperate but Mam pampered and cared me a lot. My first scan was so scary as I am not prepared mentally. Gradually Radhika Mam‚Äôs pampering and care made me come out of that mindset. Most of the doctors nowadays directly jump to conclusions and suggest some or other treatments to become parents. Dr. Radhika‚Äôs way was totally different first did a scan and later went for all blood works to know hormonal levels and suggested vitamin based on the result. We did continue the medication and hoped for the best and continue visiting clinic regularly every month for scans and blood work to conceive naturally with my PCI‚Äôs condition for 4months but later we decided and asked ourselves for quick results then we were informed about other methods and the best is IVF went ahead we have started our IVF journey in the month of may 2022 with the outstanding medical and moral support provided by Radhika Mam we got the positive result in the month of June 2022. After that we are doing regular follow ups during my pregnancy and suddenly on a Sunday started seeing heavy bleeding during end of 3 rd month morning and immediately contacted Mam who is available when needed over mobile and immediately Mam asked to come down to clinic and performed scan and confirmed everything is good and we need to take good care as there is slight sub chronic heamarage for which we are following Mam advise and care. Finally I would suggest Dr. Radhika Reddy for any fertility or gynaecology related issues she plays multiple roles (friend, mother,sibling etc) when needed for a woman

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We have visited Dr. Radhika Reddy when we were trying to start a family. She has a gentle way of performing the necessary examinations and is very thorough in her attention to details. She has always been professional, knowledgeable, and very understanding. We always feel our concerns are heard and she takes time to answer questions and provide as much information as possible to ensure we understand what is going on and what the next steps should be.She is extremely knowledgeable and always up to date with the latest medical procedures and research. All of the staff are great, especially Geetha and Aarthi ‚Äì they are very helpful, patient and helped with my appointments and pharmacy needs. We are really grateful and thankful to Dr. Radhika Reddy. We are so glad we chose (Fertinova Clinic) and would highly recommend to anyone for any fertility related issues.

It was an extremely pleasant experience. Have a follow up soon to get complete diagnosis and start treatment but the whole initial interaction with Dr.  Radhika, the way she handled me, the way the scan was conducted.... everything was smooth and well done. I am very observant of how a doctor treats the patients too(being from a doc's family) (apart from the actual problem solving and treating) and in that she was perfect. She put me at ease, was very approachable and soft spoken and also very confident in reassuring me. Feeling much calmer than I was before meeting her and am confident that my issues will be handled well.

The staff was also very good, did their job really well, specially the drawing of blood for sample. It was done pretty well.

We are so grateful to Dr.Radhika. *** ** *** ** *** **** ******* ** ********* *** ** ****** ********* *** **** ********* ********* She always listen to your problems.

We took our first appointment in July 2023 and after 3 months of treatment, my wife has conceived. We are so happy that we've consulted Dr.Radhika and it was a wise decision. 

We strongly recommend to every couple to consult Dr.Radhika madam who has got fertility related problems. Thank you so much Dr.Radhika mam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Radhika Reddy madam is the one stop solution for curing PCOS and egg release related problems. Her focus, attention and caring towards me was tremendous. Dr. Radhika madam analysis and research in suggesting medication was extremely different in terms of response and cure. We were tring for pregnancy for last 10 months but due to PCOS with egg release issue, we lost hope after consulting so many doctors. But as the caption of innovate fertility clinic says "Hope begins here", exactly our hope began. After consulting Dr. Radhika madam my husband asked for the time to show some progress, madam replied "give me 6 months". But she showed her talent and knowledge in 1 month and it's a good news, Thank you so much Dr. Radhika Reddy madam

review: am consulting the doctor since 1 year and she helped a lot. I went to doctor for PCOS treatment and she helped us to conceive naturally. The success rate is very high. Doctor is experienced and calm and listens to you. She will give suggestions and not force you for specific treatment. My wife had miscarriage and the doctor supported us during covid also. The clinic also provides infertility treatment and IVF. I have seen many couples leaving happily after successful conception. That's what this clinic promises you "Hope". üôÇ

We are so thankful to meet Dr.Radika Mam after visiting so many fertility clinics. She is so friendly, motivating with lots of patience and gives us all the hope. We visited Dr.Radhika for issues while conceiving. She is the sweetest doctor  I had ever met who will always welcome you with shining bright smile. She was constantly in touch with me on phone and made sure that I recover quickly. I am in owe of her for lifetime for helping us in embracing the most important aspect of life as being a parent.

Radhika maa‚Äôm is very friendly but we felt that her treatment is little costly for middle class people. We went there in a fear that we might not have conceived. However, without asking to wait for few more days she had done tests worth 15000. Also, she gave the medicines worth 10000 for a month in the first visit itself and folecular tracking from the 3rd day of the periods in alternate days without goving chance to conceive for a month or two. However, we were reluctant to spend that much money as our reports were OK and we waited for the day of the period. Now we are happily pregnant without any medicines and with proper diets.

Note: The fees mentioned are only visit fees. There are additional registration fees involved and compulsory trans vaginal checkup worth 1200 involved in the first visit itself.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
ONE WORD ‚ÄúSAFEST HANDS THAT BRING FRUITFUL RESULTS‚Äù

"I can recommend Dr. Rahika Reddy highly enough for her exceptional work in helping my partner and me start our family. After struggling with infertility for several years, we were referred to Dr. Rahika Reddy, and we immediately felt reassured by her expertise, warmth, and genuine care for her patients.

Dr. Rahika Reddy guided us through the IVF process with a level of knowledge and professionalism that gave us confidence every step of the way, also she was reassuring each and every step that was correctly put and executed, She was always available to answer our questions, address any concerns, and provide clear explanations of the treatment options available to us. Her attention to detail and personalized approach made us feel like we were in the best hands possible.

The results speak for themselves. Thanks to Dr. Rahika Reddy's skill and care, I am proud to say that we are 22 weeks pregnant, and our baby is the light of our lives. It wouldn't have been possible without Dr. Rahika Reddy, and my partner and I cannot thank her and her team at Fertinova enough. We are forever grateful for the amazing care we received from Dr. Rahika Reddy, and as someone who understands the difficulty of selecting the right fertility doctor, I wholeheartedly recommend her to anyone experiencing fertility challenges. She is a highly skilled and compassionate doctor who can help you with fertility issues."

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Radhika is one of the very helpful, caring & understanding doctor we have ever came across. After meeting multiple fertility specialist, we visited her as our last hope for the treatment, and today we are happy & proud parent to a baby girl with her continued support & care during our treatment & pregnancy journey. We were always very concerned, curious & worried about all the process involved during the treatment but she has always been very patient to listen all of queries & resolve it proactively. She always clearly explains each process involved in the treatment to make one comfortable. We would surely recommend her to any couple who are looking forward to start a family but unable to get a success.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: To start off objectively, Dr. Radhika is a learned doctor, friend, guide and therapist all rolled into one - so one can be assured of all round guidance and care - which is paramount for patients seeking fertility care - which can be pretty daunting and anxiety laden on its own.We have had a 1.5 year long, patient but very rewarding and reassuring journey with Dr. Radhika. She has been a constant support, and has always taken out time to explain the intricacies behind a decision. While she presents all the options available with utmost sincerity, she also ensures that there is an educated decision taken and we decide the course we would want to take. Apart from that, despite a huge footfall, Dr. always made our experience very very interpersonal, and we felt right at home, even when the times were not the greatest. The support staff is equally adept, supportive and ever present to make one's experience the best possible in the given circumstances.We had visited the Dr after TTC for a few months. After several tests, a definite reason for infertility could not be determined, and hence she suggested IVF. We finally received success in the 2nd frozen embryo transfer cycle. She was with us, every step of the way, earnestly trying to help us achieve the joy of parenthood. We are, and shall be, forever grateful. Highly recommend.

review: My journey into pregnancy has never been easy . no notable health issues or any issues in fact , neither with me or my husband and yet 3 IUIs 2 IVFs  and repeated failures . Without the doctors help and support I don‚Äôt think I would have gained the strength to go for IVF . And finally here I am 6 months pregnant healthy and happy. review:
We have tried to conceive for the past several years and consulted many doctors but unfortunately found no success. We have approached Dr. Radhika Ma'M through references. 

True to her reputation, we found her to be very meticulous, ************** and friendly. What we liked the most is that she considers the patient's best interests and prescribes her treatment. She also understands emotional issues around fertility treatment and offered her advice that instilled confidence and faith in us.

Another excellent thing about her is that she adapts her treatment according to the patient and never makes you go for unnecessary tests or surgeries. She is also available for advice and support outside hospital hours. 

Thanks to Radhika Ma'M's treatment, we became pregnant within 4 months since starting the treatment. We highly recommend her to anyone having infertility issues.

review: Words are not really enough to express my gratitude for her exceptional care and effort. I visited many doctors before coming to Dr. Radhika. In the very first visit we realised that she is the one. She is very friendly and possesses vast knowledge in her subject. Other doctors suggested me to do a myomectomy which we were not keen to do but she only suggested me to take injections instead of operation in order to reduce the fibroids. It was her positive attitude from the very beginning that all my frustrations gradually faded away and I became confident. Under her treatment all my problems got minimised and now I am on my family way. She was always there for me, just a call or message away. Another important aspect of her personality is that she never runs after money. She only prescribes/suggests things which are actually needed for treatment. Highly recommend her.

review: After 6 years of marriage we visited Dr Radhika Reddy.. she diagnosed the problems in both of us and planned the treatment well and in 6 months had good news üòäshe is always available in case of emergency and gives very detailed explanation of the treatment.. listens to our concerns and addresses them.. highly recommend for those who are trying to get pregnant üòä

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We have been for trying 18 years and visited numerous centers for treatment  but was not succeeded. After consulting Dr Radhika mam, explained the problem very clearly. She started the treatment and planned for IVF and was successful. I highly recommend the doctor. Many thanks for helping us.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Visited Dr Radhika Reddy for infertility treatment.  Dr had a plan in place based on my complications. Her experience and expertise played a vital role in overcoming challenges. I am now postive and thank you Dr for your time, patience & efforts in helping couples achieve their pregnancy . Will recommend Dr Radhika Reddy for infertility treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We have been trying for lot of years going around neumerous centres with no result. Due to a referal  we came to Dr Radhika Reddy Pingili
She went through my problems and studied both me and my husband and treated us 
she is very patient an friendly with us
we are very happy that I am pregnant in my first ivf treatment cycle
recommend maam any day 
thanks maam

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Fertilisation In Vitro - Embryo Transfer (IVF - ET),
review:
We contact with Dr. Radhika through Apollo. Later on we visited her clinic. I can give you assurance that doctor is highly cooperative, very friendly with patient, discuss the difficulties of patient with a very gentle approach until we are clear, always tries her best for the patient.
Still we are in a process of success. I will be highly recommended Dr. Radhika for her speciality in this ground. Her clinic is well established and enough spacious with good number of professional staffs.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: we have waited for 5 years to have baby that dream has come true now because of Dr.Radhika Mam.Thank you doctor for giving me such a beautiful gift , very much satisfied with your treatment and your smile , friendly nature made me fearless during infertility treatment.Thank you once again doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: I feel good infertility treatment  it's a very good clinic Dr.Radika Reddy garu is very experienced doctor

First visit: Doctor was friendly and listened to us. Then prescribed a test and asked to come back next day. 
Second visit: She did not have time to listen to us and answer our questions.
reply_text:
I am sorry you felt rushed but I had an emergency just checked my diary on the first consultation we discussed all options 
Please book another appointment at your convenience and I will make sure your questions are answered I will ensure your consultation is not charged
